ayas.text: qulillāhumma mālikal mulki tu-til mulka man tashā-u watanzi`ul mulka mimman tashā-u watu`izzu man tashā-u watudhillu man tashā-u ۖ biyadikal khayr ۖ innaka `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
tūlijul layla fin nahāri watūlijun nahāra fil layl ۖ watukhrijul ḥayya minal mayyiti watukhrijul mayyita minal ḥayy ۖ watarzuqu man tashā-u bighayri ḥisāb
